page.title: 15CULTURAL EDUCATION: L'BORO
page.content:
The{Nanpantan Playgroup}meets in the old village school where there is a large room and a playground. 100 children aged 3 & 4 attend twice a week during 5 morning and 4 afternoon sessions. Most children live locally and pay 75p per session. The playgroup has no grant and must be self_supporting. There are 10 paid leaders and several helpers.{
The{Scout Hut,}built in l949 and extended in l978, is on Nanpantan Rd. Prior to this time the group met at the old school. 32 Brownies and 28 Guides meet on Mondays and Tuesdays. 18 Beavers, 31 cubs and 36 scouts meet on Wednesdays and Thursdays covering ages from 7 to 15 years. Guiding and Scouting provide many opportunities to learn and practice skills thereby giving training for life.
